ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ذِكْرًا كَثِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You who have iman! remember Allah much,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O you who believe, remember God a great deal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O People who Believe! Remember Allah profusely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O you who believe! Remember Allah with much remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O you who believe! remember Allah, remembering frequently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye who believe! Remember Allah with much remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Ye who believe! remember Allah with much remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O you who have faith! Remember Allah with frequent remembrance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye who believe! Celebrate the praises of Allah, and do this often;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O you who believe! Remember Allah with much remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O you who believe, remember God with frequent remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O you who have believed, remember Allah with much remembrance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:41] O you who believe! Remember God with much remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 ye who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an! (Remember Allah with much remembrance) with your tongue and heart, when you engage in acts of obedience and also when you indulge in transgression.
